item.title: Command help (pi)
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

hey i want to make a command that opens websites on other peoples computer through their client
so it would be like ::command name player name
and it opens the website on their computer

also if you know how to open a website through a command in 317/delta i need that too.

it will need to use this in it somewhere…

			c2.getPA().sendFrame126("google.com", 12000);

thanks

edit:
ive tried this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("open") && c.playerRights >= 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.getPA().sendFrame126("google.com", 12000); } } }
but it opens it for everyone on server

Read full topic
